meanings.definition: A person who ignores or disregards something.
meanings.sent1: The ignorers in the class didn't listen to the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The ignorers at the meeting refused to participate.
meanings.sent3: The group of ignorers missed out on the surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The ignorers were like statues, unmoved by the commotion around them.
meanings.sent5: The ignorers stood out in the crowd, their indifference palpable.

meanings.definition: Those who intentionally choose to not acknowledge or pay attention to something.
meanings.sent1: The ignorers of the warning signs faced consequences.
meanings.sent2: The ignorers of the rules were reprimanded.
meanings.sent3: The team of ignorers pretended not to see the obvious solution.
meanings.sent4: The group of ignorers sailed through life with blinders on.
meanings.sent5: The ignorers' lack of awareness led to missed opportunities.
